effect: Boosts Attack by one stage when hit by a Grass-type move, and grants immunity to Grass-type moves.
synergies: Works well with Pokémon weak to Grass, like Water or Ground types.
Pairs with moves like Swords Dance to further boost Attack.
Can absorb status moves like Spore or Sleep Powder.
notes: Does not protect against Grass-type status moves that don't deal damage, such as Leech Seed or Stun Spore.
